description:
Summary:

Remove hardcoded resources from xml layout files. Eg:- Use dimensions from dimens.

Steps to reproduce:

Go through the project codebase and layout files.

Expected behaviour:

Remove hardcoded resources from xml layout files.

Observed behaviour:

Some resources like dimensions, strings, colors are hardcoded in layout files.

Device and Android version:

Android Pi.
name: Mifos Mobile: Remove hardcoded resources from xml layout files
